snippet: The injury-riddled Jaguars will have to use a special-teams player at running back Sunday against the Jets.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Jacksonville Jaguars, suffering from several running back injuries, will start special-teams player Montell Owens at the position in upcoming game against New York Jets; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The injury-riddled Jaguars will have to use a special-teams player at running back Sunday against the Jets.

headline.seo: N.F.L. Roundup — Injuries Force Jaguars to Improvise Against Jets
headline.main: Injuries Force Jaguars to Ad-Lib Against Jets
headline.print_headline: Injuries Force Jaguars To Ad-Lib Against Jets
